# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of what this PR does.

Fixes #(issue number)

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code cleanup/refactoring

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `cargo fmt` and `cargo clippy`
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`cargo test --workspace`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests achieve good coverage
- [ ] No new clippy warnings introduced

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated doc comments for public APIs
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested this locally on my machine
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added integration tests (if applicable)

Does this change affect performance? If yes, describe the impact and include benchmark results.

Any additional information that reviewers should know.
